ygData.subject: [EQ] Mysteries of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: Once someone sent me a URL for an EQ bulletin board/discussion forum that contained a thread on Mysteries of Norrath. Focusing on the wall pictures that are
ygData.messageBody:
Once someone sent me a URL for an EQ bulletin board/discussion forum that contained a thread on Mysteries of Norrath. Focusing on the wall pictures that are the same in various places.

I lost the url, does anyone have it or recall where this thread was? I found another thread called Myths and Mysteries of Norrath that included the Fiery Avenger, Sea Serpent, clockwork dragon in its initial post... this was interesting too, but not the one I recall reading.

Please help?


Shannyn
